meanings.sent1: The arythmic sound of the dripping faucet kept me awake all night.
meanings.sent2: The arythmic drumming of the rain on the roof was soothing.
meanings.sent3: His arythmic dance moves made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The arythmic ticking of the clock echoed through the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The arythmic chirping of the crickets filled the night with a sense of randomness.

meanings.definition: Not following a regular pattern or beat
meanings.sent1: The arythmic pattern of the wallpaper made the room feel chaotic.
meanings.sent2: Her arythmic footsteps echoed in the empty hallway.
meanings.sent3: The arythmic beeping of the alarm clock confused the cat.
meanings.sent4: The arythmic flow of traffic made the commute unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The arythmic tapping of the typewriter created a sense of disarray in the office.
